application.controller.interfaces

Packages, die application.controller.interfaces verwenden
Package
Beschreibung
application.controller
 
  • Von application.controller verwendete Klassen in application.controller.interfaces
    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    Applicable
    Represents a component that supports applying changes and providing a model.
    Editable
    Represents an editable component that supports editing actions.
    Exitable
    Represents a component that supports cancel actions.
    Startable
    Represents a component that can start or trigger a new screen event.
